rules_text:
Choose one or both –
• Return target creature from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target artifact creature from your graveyard to your hand.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/442d4


OG_2:
Used one or more

OG_1:
Return target creature from your graveyard to your hand. If it’s an artifact creature, draw a card.
